# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="505c1-102">Imprimir el correo electrónico y los calendarios en Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="505c1-103">Para imprimir un mensaje de correo electrónico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="505c1-104">Seleccione el mensaje que desea imprimir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="505c1-105">En la esquina superior derecha del mensaje, selecciona los puntos suspensivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="505c1-106">y, a continuación, selecciona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="505c1-107">**Imprimir**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="505c1-108">Para imprimir el calendario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="505c1-109">En la esquina superior derecha de la página, selecciona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="505c1-110">**Imprimir**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="505c1-111">Seleccione la vista y el intervalo de tiempo, y seleccione **Imprimir**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="505c1-112">Obtenga más información sobre cómo [Imprimir correo electrónico y calendarios en Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="505c1-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
